name: illimitable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
without limit: The country is currently in a boom phase, and the possibilities of expansion appear illimitable. There are vast illimitable forests stretching away into the frozen North.
More examplesFewer examplesThe broad, arid landscape stretched out before us to the illimitable distance.As well as being illimitable, the city seemed to have little or no comprehensible street plan.The First World War must sometimes have seemed illimitable and insoluble. She emphasized the potentially illimitable effects of education.
